This has something to do with the i18n changes I made recently.  BTW, this passes on OS X when running against the ICU4J replacement plugin.  I'll try grabbing the full ICU4J to see if that makes a difference.

Created an attachment (id=61230)
patch

This patch will fix the issue.  The problem was that formatting was hard coded in the tests and once the full ICU4J was used these values were incorrectly formatted.  I fixed all potential issues in the test.

Tested with:
* 3.2.2 full ICU4J
* 3.2.2 replacement ICU4j
* 3.3M5eh full ICU4J
* 3.3M5eh replacement ICU4J
When is an appropriate time for me to apply this patch?  The issue was with the test, not data binding.

If you're happy with your patch, you can apply it now and we'll include it in the 13:00 build.

PW
